ComicInfo.Title: Dawn
ComicInfo.Summary: Dawn: In Gotham, after their allies sacrifice themselves to give them the chance, Barbara and Harley confront Dick, the king of the vampires. Grifter and Green Arrow battle Hawkman to free the humans kept captive in Smallville. John Constantine brings in Mary Marvel and Captain Cold in a last-ditch attempt to save Supergirl, humanity's last hope. Dick tries to convince Barbara to join him in leading to vampires, leading Barbara to make a tough decision.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 20:05:19. [CVDB961561] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:48:35. [Issue ID 2468791]
